con:config.name: SendReq
con:config.con:request:
<Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request object="SYSTEM" Action="LOGON" UserName="SuperUser" password="kronites"/>
<Request Action="RetrieveAllNames"> <SchedulePattern /> </Request>
<Request Object="System" Action="Logoff"/> </Kronos_WFC>

con:testStep.name: Copy of Verify Volume With Different Offsets

con:assertion.name: Verify Volume (Validation of ene of below test groups will pass the whole test step)

con:config.name: Copy of 902_Retrieve Labor Standard
con:config.con:request: <?xml version="1.0"?> <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <!-- ****************************************** --> <!-- Retrieve Labor Standard with default values --> <!-- Author: Frank H. --> <!-- ****************************************** --> <Request Action="load"> <LaborStandard GenericDepartmentName="${Department01}Of${Store01}" IsActive="true" LaborStandardName="${LaborStandard01}"> </LaborStandard> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request Action="Update"> <ReforecastingAlertThreshold Name="Test2" Description="Test2"> <AlertThresholdItems> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem TuesdayLowerThresholdValue="-5" MondayLowerThresholdValue="-13" MondayUpperThresholdValue="20" EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-10" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="10" VolumeDriverId="1" TuesdayUpperThresholdValue="12" Priority="2"/> </AlertThresholdItems> </ReforecastingAlertThreshold> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>
